definition: ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
the seventy two martyrs of the Huanghuagang uprising of 23rd April 1911
pinyin: Huang2 hua1 gang1 qi1 shi2 er4 lie4 shi4

sentences.english: Passion alone cannot win the revolution; Passion just makes martyrs.
sentences.chinese: 光靠满腔热血，不会使革命成，只能制造烈士。

sentences.english: His relief sculpture in Shanghai Long Hua Martyrs' Cemetery can prove it.
sentences.chinese: 上海龙华烈士陵园中他的浮雕可引以为证。

sentences.english: He lies at rest in the Martyrs' Cemetery.
Whether our lovable party did die in line of duty this professor locates the martyr?
sentences.chinese: 我们可爱的党是否把这位因公殉职的教授定位烈士呢？

sentences.english: A monument was built in dedication to the memory of revolutionary martyrs.
sentences.chinese: 为纪念革命烈士建造了一座纪念碑。

sentences.english: So far, the Soviet martyrs' monuments in China have been renovated.
sentences.chinese: 目前，中国境内的苏军烈士纪念碑修缉一新。

sentences.english: The park showcased the statues of those martyrs who were killed during the failed uprising.
sentences.chinese: 陵园摆放着那些壮烈牺牲烈士们的石像。

sentences.english: After the disintegration of the Soviet Union, the guard post was moved to the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier beside.
sentences.chinese: 苏联解体后，这个哨位被移到了无名烈士墓旁。

sentences.english: We paid a visit to the monument to the revolutionary martyrs with great respect.
sentences.chinese: 我们怀着崇敬的心情瞻仰了革命烈士纪念碑。

sentences.english: His ashes were placed in the Martyr Mausoleum Hall of the Funeral Parlor of Hegang – his second homeland.
sentences.chinese: 他的骨灰被放到了第二故乡鹤岗殡仪馆烈士陵堂。

sentences.english: Penances , fasting, virginity, martyrdom, and other good deeds please him and receive his reward.
sentences.chinese: 空腹，贞操，烈士和其他好事请他和接受他的奖励。

sentences.english: In the mountain Donglu was the cemetery of revolutionary martyrs.
sentences.chinese: 在山的东麓是辛亥革命烈士陵园。

sentences.english: Wreaths were laid at the martyr's tomb.
Can my star of good fortune , you tell me how to get rid of the martyr park?
sentences.chinese: 我的幸运之星，你能告诉我怎样去烈士公园吗？

sentences.english: This is the Red Hill, there are many martyrs were buried in this hill.
sentences.chinese: 这是赤军山，有很多地烈士就葬在这个山上。

sentences.english: On Tomb-sweeping Day, we paid our respects to revolutionary martyrs.
sentences.chinese: 清明节，我们拜扫了烈士墓。

definition: to sacrifice oneself in a just cause/a victim of a disaster
to die in an accident/to die for a just cause
to mourn/to pay last respects/mourning/memorial (service etc)
Resist US, help North Korea (1950s slogan)
